title: He collapsed in 103 degree heat working his Texas UPS route. Four days later he was dead.
description: UPS driver Chris Begley died after collapsing on his route in a heat wave. His death came two months after a Texas USPS carrier died on his route.
content:
A UPS delivery driver who recently collapsed on his route while working in scorching North Texas heat has died, his employer confirmed Thursday.

title: California African American Museum to Remain Closed Until October Due to Tropical Storm Damage
description: "Rain intrusion" forced the museum to shutter once more.
content:
The California African American Museum in Los Angeles said on Thursday that it could not reopen for the time being due to heavy rains that struck the city earlier this month.
